text: yqwl allah llmalakyn alssayiq walshhyd baed 'an yafsil bayn alkhlayq: 'alqia fi jahanam kula jahd 'ana allah hu al'ilh alhqqu, kthyr alkufr waltkdhyb meand llhq, mnnae li'ada' ma ealayh min alhuquq fi malh, muetd ealaa eibad allah waealaa hdwdh, shakk fi waedah wweydh, aldhy 'ushrik ballh, febd maeah mebwdana akhar min khlqh, fa'alqiah fi eadhab jahanam alshdyd
